author: cbs8
title: Frost & Sullivan to Honour Industry's Premier Companies at the 2015 Excellence in Best Practices Awards Banquet
text:
Frost & Sullivan
Prestigious Frost & Sullivan excellence Awards recognise outstanding companies
LONDON , Oct. 14, Frost & Sullivan's highly anticipated, season-ending 2015 Excellence in Best Practices Awards Banquet will honour top achievers and innovators drawn from Europe and Africa at a glittering banquet held at the Monte-Carlo Bay Hotel & Resort, Monaco , on 22nd October, 2015 . The two-part black-tie event celebrates the exceptional performances of companies as well as their strategies, processes and executives.
The 2015 Best Practices Awards Banquet features a veritable who's who of the industry's premier companies and their leaders. The select recipients are chosen by expert industry analysts through proprietary methodologies that measure performance and compare competitors against benchmarked best practices..
"By bringing together cross-industry innovators and recognizing the advancements they bring to their fields, we showcase the meaning of Best Practices," said Frost & Sullivan Senior Global Vice President, Best Practices, Jeffrey Frigstad . "Our global banquets truly celebrate significant industry accomplishments in the business world."
The awardees have been drawn from a wide spectrum of sectors spanning IT, healthcare, energy, automation, chemicals, and materials. Some of the areas of excellence were product leadership, product innovation, customer service leadership, technology innovation as well as competitive strategy innovation and leadership.
The Best Practices Awards Banquet offers unparalleled access to the industry's best. So, join Frost & Sullivan in honouring these luminaries whose visionary leadership and best practices redefined industry standards throughout the course of the year.
Event Schedule
Venue :
Monte-Carlo Bay Hotel & Resort
40, avenue Princesse Grace
Monaco – 98000
Date :
Thursday, 22 October, 2015
14:30 – 17:30: Award Banquet Ceremony Registration
17:30 – 18:30: Cocktail Reception
18:30 - 19:30: Award Ceremony – Part One
19:30 – 20:45: Dinner
20.45 - 22.00: Awards Ceremony - Part Two
22.00 - 23.30: Celebration Reception
About Frost & Sullivan
Frost & Sullivan, the Growth Partnership Company, works in collaboration with clients to leverage visionary innovation that addresses the global challenges and related growth opportunities that will make or break today's market participants.
Our "Growth Partnership" supports clients by addressing these opportunities and incorporating two key elements driving visionary innovation: The Integrated Value Proposition and The Partnership Infrastructure.
The Integrated Value Proposition provides support to our clients throughout all phases of their journey to visionary innovation including: research, analysis, strategy, vision, innovation and implementation. The Partnership Infrastructure is entirely unique as it constructs the foundation upon which visionary innovation becomes possible. This includes our 360 degree research, comprehensive industry coverage, career best practices as well as our global footprint of more than 40 offices. For more than 50 years, we have been developing growth strategies for the global 1000, emerging businesses, the public sector and the investment community. Is your organisation prepared for the next profound wave of industry convergence, disruptive technologies, increasing competitive intensity, Mega Trends, breakthrough best practices, changing customer dynamics and emerging economies?
